attributes.action: Force companys to take on inexperienced workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a real problem in this country with the goverment saying one thing and companys saying the other.

The goverment say you need a hgv licence to drive a truck.Companys say you need that and 2 years experience.

I have just recently passed my hgv test and can't get a job because of this.There are loads of jobs on the job centre website,but i can't get one because of lack of experience.

Well the obvious question is "How do i get experience when i can't get a job"?.

This is not just a problem with hgv driving but alot of other jobs as well.

I think companys should be forced by the goverment to take inexperienced workers on,as this is partly the reason why alot of young people are out of work !
